life.threedee.game

Class GameUtilities

  • java.lang.Object
    • life.threedee.game.GameUtilities

  • public class GameUtilities
extends java.lang.Object
    A class containing various variables and methods that are used throughout the program.
    This also allows for easy editing of the game rules, speeds, and resources.

    • Field Detail

      • SC_WIDTH

        public static final int SC_WIDTH
        The width of the display in pixels.
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • SC_HEIGHT

        public static final int SC_HEIGHT
        The height of the display in pixels.
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • R_INC

        public static int R_INC
        The pixels incrementer value. If it is set to a natural number x, then x screen pixels equals one in-game pixels. This allows us to change the resolution by just altering one value. Note that a 2x increase in R_INC leads to a 4x decrease in game speed.

      • PX_METER

        public static final int PX_METER
        The amount of pixels per meter. Used to convert pixels in textures to in-game distances.
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • PX_WALL_BORDER

        public static final int PX_WALL_BORDER
        The amount of pixels that the border of each wall is wide.
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

        public static final int WALL_HEIGHT
        See Also:

        public static final java.awt.Color W_BLUE
        The color of the wall borders.

      • INTERSECTIONS

        public static final boolean[][][] INTERSECTIONS
        An array storing the directions in which ghosts can go at any given tile.

      • GAME_DATA

        public static final int[][] GAME_DATA
        An array storing various elements of data for the game. In order: Pacman's speed as a percentage of his maximum speed. The speed of the ghosts as a percentage of Pacman's maximum speed. The amount of point you get for eating a SpecialPointsConsumable The amount of dots left for Cruise Elroy to activate. The amount of ticks required for ghosts to leave the ghost house if no pellets are eaten.

      • EXIT_PELLETS

        public static final int[][] EXIT_PELLETS
        Pellets needed for the ghosts to exit the ghost house.

      • POSTMORTEM_PELLETS

        public static final int[] POSTMORTEM_PELLETS
        Pellets needed for the ghosts to exit the ghost house once the player has died.

      • STARTING_LIVES

        public static final int STARTING_LIVES
        The amount of lives you start with.
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • FRIGHTENED_DATA

        public static final int[][] FRIGHTENED_DATA
        All data regarding frightened ghosts. It's time spent scared and the amount of warning flashes.

      • MODE_TIMES

        public static final int[][] MODE_TIMES
        The lengths of each mode per level, with scatter being at the start in each level.

      • GHOST_COLORS
